enb.codec_implementations package¶

Submodules¶

enb.codec_implementations.bitstream module¶

Tools to handle binary streams at the bit level

exception enb.codec_implementations.bitstream.CorruptedStreamError¶

Bases: BaseException

exception enb.codec_implementations.bitstream.EmptyStreamError¶

Bases: BaseException

class enb.codec_implementations.bitstream.InputBitStream(path)¶

Bases: object

get_bit()¶

Read the next bit in the stream

:raises EmptyStreamError if trying to read beyond the file limit

get_unsigned_value(nbits)¶

Read the next nbit unsigned representation

peek_unsigned_value(nbits)¶
class enb.codec_implementations.bitstream.OutputBitStream(path, append=False)¶

Bases: object

Class that allows writing individual bits to a file.

close()¶

Close and flush any remaining bits

property current_bit_position¶
flush()¶

Flush all data put in self (but don’t close)

flush_complete_bytes()¶

Flush only complete bytes stored

pending_bit_buffer_size = 1024¶
put_bit(bit)¶

Put a single bit in the stream

put_bits(bits)¶
put_unsigned_value(value, nbits)¶

Put an unsigned value represented in nbits, from MSB to LSB.

enb.codec_implementations.trivial_codecs module¶

class enb.codec_implementations.trivial_codecs.TrivialCpWrapper¶

Bases: enb.codec.WrapperCodec, enb.codec.LosslessCodec

Trivial codec wrapper for /bin/cp.

get_compression_params(original_path, compressed_path, original_file_info: enb.codec.FileInfo)¶

Return a string (shell style) with the parameters to be passed to the compressor. Same parameter semantics as AbstractCodec.compress().

get_decompression_params(compressed_path, reconstructed_path, original_file_info: enb.codec.FileInfo)¶

Return a string (shell style) with the parameters to be passed to the decompressor. Same parameter semantics as AbstractCodec.decompress().

class enb.codec_implementations.trivial_codecs.TrivialLosslessCodec(param_dict=None)¶

Bases: enb.codec.LosslessCodec

Trivial is_lossless codec (files are copied without any further processing)

compress(original_path: str, compressed_path: str, original_file_info=None)¶

Compress original_path into compress_path using param_dict as params. :return a CompressionResults instance

decompress(compressed_path, reconstructed_path, original_file_info=None)¶

Decompress compressed_path into reconstructed_path using param_dict as params (if needed). :return a DecompressionResults instance
